name: diskutierBar
description:
diskutierBar is a German narrative-driven game, where you discuss deep topics with a strange being. 

The narrative tree didn´t quite work and so just a tiny bit of the story is actually playable.  If you get asked "Denkst du, dass du einen Einfluss auf das Klima hast?" you have to answer with yes, otherwise the game gets stuck.

This game was made as part of the GGJ 2022 with the theme "Duality".

Team:

Programming: Özden Cifci, Lisa Pösch

Sound: Christian Renner & Jannik Fraunholz (The Pulpy Principle)

3D-Art: Andrej Kunkel, Lisa Pösch

Narration: Chrisitan Renner & Jannik Fraunholz
